name: part_008
file: tmp_【3DLIVE】歌に謎解きにホラーあり！？こよりらしさを詰め込んだライブ！ - THE KOYORI - 【 #博衣こより1周年 ⧸ホロライブ】 [aLgQxWOWEnw]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_008.mov

scenes.description: MC section after the song performance. Koyori is taking photos with Flare and Noel.
Flare and Noel give Koyori a new command and leave the stage.
Koyori arrives at the location for the new command.
Koyori reads the "Trial" command and is forced to wear VR goggles for Resident Evil 7.
Koyori plays Resident Evil 7 in VR, reacting with fear to various in-game events.

subtitles.original: いますね。
subtitles.english: There she is.

subtitles.original: 3人で。
subtitles.english: With the three of us.

subtitles.original: 今日、この辺にあの、こよりがいるということでいいんですかね。
subtitles.english: So, I guess it's okay to say that Koyori is around here today?

subtitles.original: 姿を手に入れてな。
subtitles.english: Now that you've got your form.

subtitles.original: ちょっと待って、私3Dの時に…
subtitles.english: Wait a second, when I was in 3D...

subtitles.original: いいよ、いるよ。
subtitles.english: It's okay, she's here.

subtitles.original: いるよ。
subtitles.english: She's here.

subtitles.original: みんなここにこよりがいるからね。
subtitles.english: Everyone, Koyori is right here, after all.

subtitles.original: 本物の、後で貼ってくださいね。
subtitles.english: The real one, please paste it in later.

subtitles.original: いやいやちょっと、こよりどうすればいいんだこれ、
subtitles.english: Wait, wait, how should Koyori do this?

subtitles.original: こうすればいいのか。
subtitles.english: Should I do it like this?

subtitles.original: いるよ、こよりと3人でね。
subtitles.english: She's here, the three of us with Koyori.

subtitles.original: 取れた？やっと取れた、イエーイ！
subtitles.english: Did we get it? Finally got it, yay!

subtitles.original: イエーイ！
subtitles.english: Yay!

subtitles.original: 撮れました。
subtitles.english: We got it.

subtitles.original: はい、ありがとうございます。
subtitles.english: Yes, thank you very much.

subtitles.original: あ、そうだ、ついでにこよりにね、
subtitles.english: Oh, right, by the way, for Koyori...

subtitles.original: あ、はい。
subtitles.english: Oh, yes.

subtitles.original: ダメダメ、そっち行っちゃ。
subtitles.english: No, no, don't go that way.

subtitles.original: 何何何？
subtitles.english: What, what, what?

subtitles.original: 次の司令が来ているんですよ。
subtitles.english: The next command has arrived.

subtitles.original: 司令？まだあるんですか？
subtitles.english: Command? There's more?

subtitles.original: そう、衣装をもらったからってね、終わりじゃねんだ。
subtitles.english: Yeah, just because you got the outfit doesn't mean it's over.

subtitles.original: え？
subtitles.english: Huh?

subtitles.original: 終わるわけないだろ、ホロライブ。
subtitles.english: There's no way it's ending, this is Hololive.

subtitles.original: ということでね、あの、次の場所に行く司令が来ているので、ここに行ってください。
subtitles.english: So, a command to go to the next location has arrived, so please go here.

subtitles.original: は、え、分かりました。
subtitles.english: H-huh? Okay, I understand.

subtitles.original: じゃあ私たちはもうお別れです。
subtitles.english: Well then, we're off now.

subtitles.original: うそ！
subtitles.english: No way!

subtitles.original: じゃあ楽しんで、またな。
subtitles.english: Have fun, see ya.

subtitles.original: いくよ。
subtitles.english: Here we go.

subtitles.original: せーの、バイバーイ！
subtitles.english: Ready, bye-bye!

subtitles.original: うわーーー！
subtitles.english: Whoa---!

subtitles.original: 司令書に書いてあるところに来たけど、ここは一体どこなんだ。
subtitles.english: I came to the place written in the command, but where on earth is this?

subtitles.original: なんか寂しい。
subtitles.english: It feels a bit lonely.

subtitles.original: 試練
subtitles.english: Trial

subtitles.original: 恐怖を乗り越えて助手くんを笑顔にしろ
subtitles.english: Overcome fear and make your assistants smile.

subtitles.original: 初めてのバイオハザードVRをプレイすべし
subtitles.english: You must play Resident Evil VR for the first time.

subtitles.original: いやだ、こよ、バイオハザードめっちゃ好きになったんですけど、
subtitles.english: No way... Koyo, I've come to really like Resident Evil, but...

subtitles.original: いや、でもVRは多分めっちゃ怖いと思うんです、やってきてなくて。
subtitles.english: Well, I think VR will probably be super scary. I haven't done it before.

subtitles.original: いや、絶対無理無理無理無理、嫌です嫌です嫌です、無理です！
subtitles.english: No, it's absolutely impossible, impossible, impossible... I don't want to, I don't want to, I don't want to, it's impossible!

subtitles.original: あーーー！つけられたーーー！
subtitles.english: Aaaah! They put them on me---!

subtitles.original: ということで、無理やりVRゴーグルをつけられたこよは、
subtitles.english: And so, Koyo, having been forced to wear the VR goggles,

subtitles.original: みんなを笑顔にするために、試練に挑むことに。
subtitles.english: takes on the trial to make everyone smile.

subtitles.original: 始まりまーす！
subtitles.english: It's starting!

subtitles.original: うわ、緊張する。
subtitles.english: Whoa, I'm nervous.

subtitles.original: 7の最初、あ、これもしかなて
subtitles.english: The beginning of 7... oh, could this be...

subtitles.original: ミアの映像、あ、お元気？
subtitles.english: Mia's video... oh, you're doing well?

subtitles.original: かえって、あなたを大事にしてほしいっていう連絡したくて。
subtitles.english: I'm coming home... I wanted to call and say I want you to take care of yourself.

subtitles.original: ミアありがとう、何？
subtitles.english: Mia, thank you. What?

subtitles.original: 良いニュース、もう少しで家に帰れることになったの。
subtitles.english: Good news, it turns out I'll be home soon.

subtitles.original: 嘘なんでしょ？
subtitles.english: That's a lie, right?

subtitles.original: このメッセージをもし見てるなら…
subtitles.english: If you're watching this message...

subtitles.original: これ今の映像や、あ、ミア！
subtitles.english: This is the current footage... oh, Mia!

subtitles.original: 探さないで。
subtitles.english: Don't look for me.

subtitles.original: 探す、探す、探したくないけど探す、イーサンはそういう男だから、
subtitles.english: I'll look, I'll look... I don't want to look, but I'll look. Because Ethan is that kind of man.

subtitles.original: こよりは探せないけど多分、怖いから。
subtitles.english: Koyori can't look though, probably, because it's scary.

subtitles.original: すげえ、生い茂ってる！
subtitles.english: Wow, it's so overgrown!

subtitles.original: え、すごい、怖い。
subtitles.english: Whoa, amazing, scary.

subtitles.original: ここはまだ怖くなかったはずなんだよな。
subtitles.english: It shouldn't have been scary here yet.

subtitles.original: うわ、びっくりした！あ、イーサンの手だ、虫が飛んでんね。
subtitles.english: Whoa, that startled me! Oh, it's Ethan's hand. There are bugs flying around.

subtitles.original: 昔のプレイを思い出しながら、イーサンと一緒にミアを探しに来たこよ。
subtitles.english: Remembering her past playthrough, Koyo came with Ethan to find Mia.

subtitles.original: 今日は時間の都合上、残念ながら全編をお見せできないため、
subtitles.english: Unfortunately, due to time constraints, we can't show you the whole thing,

subtitles.original: ここからは助手くんにたくさんのこよりニウムをお届けします。
subtitles.english: so from here on, we'll be delivering plenty of Koyorinium to the assistants.

subtitles.original: やめよう、うわ、暗い、
subtitles.english: Let's stop... whoa, it's dark,

subtitles.original: 暗い、暗い、早く助けてイーサン！
subtitles.english: dark, dark... save me quickly, Ethan!

subtitles.original: ハイジエンドお前もって助けて！
subtitles.english: High-spec PC, you too, save me!

subtitles.original: ここ開けらんないんだよね、最初あれ開けらん…
subtitles.english: I can't open this part, can't open that at first...

subtitles.original: うわ、びっくりした、違う！
subtitles.english: Whoa, that startled me! No!

subtitles.original: ぎゃー！これは自分の手にびっくりしてる。
subtitles.english: Gyaah! I'm startling myself with my own hand.

subtitles.original: うわー！下覗き込む、すごい、足すくむ。
subtitles.english: Uwaah! Looking down... wow, my legs are shaking.

subtitles.original: うわーーー！
subtitles.english: Uwaaaaah!

subtitles.original: うわーーー！
subtitles.english: Uwaaaaah!

subtitles.original: VRやべえ！
subtitles.english: VR is crazy!

subtitles.original: おわっ！
subtitles.english: Ow!

subtitles.original: いやー、お前を助けに来たのにどうして、どうして？
subtitles.english: Nooo... I came to save you, so why, why?

subtitles.original: イーサンガード！怖い、ここじゃなかったっけ？
subtitles.english: Ethan guard! Scary... wasn't it here?

subtitles.original: 私…
うわーーー！
subtitles.english: Uwaaaaah!

subtitles.original: うわーーー！
subtitles.english: Uwaaaaah!

subtitles.original: やめてください！ちょっと待ってハンドガン一個しかない。
subtitles.english: Please stop! Wait a second, I only have one handgun.

subtitles.original: ミアごめんね、邪魔！
subtitles.english: Mia, I'm sorry... move!

subtitles.original: 最愛のミアとの死闘を繰り広げ、なんとか倒すことができたこよさんだったが…
subtitles.english: After a life-or-death struggle with her beloved Mia, Koyo-san managed to defeat her, but...

subtitles.original: お前も家族だ。
subtitles.english: You're part of the family now.

subtitles.original: あ、パパさん！殴られたーーー！
subtitles.english: Oh, Papi! He hit me---!

subtitles.original: パパさん、おじさん、うわーーー！
subtitles.english: Papi, old man, uwaaaaah!

subtitles.original: ファミパンもあったっけ？
subtitles.english: Was there a Family Punch too?

subtitles.original: お前も家族になるんだよ！
subtitles.english: You're going to become part of the family!

subtitles.original: ファミパンおじさんに捕まってしまったこよさんは…
subtitles.english: Koyo-san, who was caught by the Family Punch old man...

subtitles.original: どうにかおじさんから逃れようと必死に逃げ惑う。
subtitles.english: Desperately wanders around trying to escape from the old man.

subtitles.original: イーサン行け行け行け行け、行くぞ！
subtitles.english: Ethan, go go go go... let's go!

subtitles.original: おい、こっちへ来い、早く出よう！
subtitles.english: Hey, come over here, let's get out of here fast!

subtitles.original: ついにファミパンおじさんとの勝負に挑むことに。
subtitles.english: Finally, it's time for a showdown with the Family Punch old man.

subtitles.original: いいか、まずこんなところで一人で何をしてるのか説明しろ。
subtitles.english: Listen, first explain what you're doing alone in a place like this.

subtitles.original: あ、そんな場合じゃない、お前死ぬぞ、お前死ぬぞ、
subtitles.english: Oh, this isn't the time for that! You're gonna die, you're gonna die!

subtitles.original: 俺が？これは仕事だ、いいか、本当のことを俺の質問に答えろ。
subtitles.english: Me? This is my job. Now, tell me the truth in response to my questions.

subtitles.original: ちょっと待って、どこから出てくるか見て…
subtitles.english: Wait a second, let me see where he comes from...

subtitles.original: 言っても信じるわけないさ。
subtitles.english: Even if you told me, I wouldn't believe it.

subtitles.original: どこから出てきた？いや話を聞け！
subtitles.english: Where did he come from? No, listen to me!

subtitles.original: おい、シャッターを閉めるな！待て、何だ？
subtitles.english: Hey, don't close the shutter! Wait, what's this?

subtitles.original: あ、後ろ、パパさん！
subtitles.english: Oh, behind you! Papi!

subtitles.original: まて、離せ！
subtitles.english: Wait, let go!
